reviews.review: I do not like how they force you to level up before playing comp, our friend could not play because of this.  Please fix!

this game honestly makes me wanna bash my head against a brick wall. every time I queue for a competitive match, I am placed in an uneven game where I am either put in an entire team of people in lower skill groups than I am, or I play against an entire team of players 2-3+ skill groups ahead of me. that being said, game is fun. I like it.

please add perma ban for prime trolls, joining competitive with premates just for trolling games.
its worse than cheaters, ban them, make match invalid for ranking.
also ranking still broken, teammates hiding archive no map advantage for team and just wait somewhere for easy kills. noobs get ranked higher because they dont play this game. just broken.

not worth the money!
